summary: Changing the terrible hawk texture to a more higher resolution texture
descriptionHtml:
This is my first texture mod ever so I\'ve would be glad if you provided some sort of feedback. 


ISSUE:
I found (when I was hunting birds) that hawks have a really bad texture and I thought that someone  should do an improvment so I went on the nexus and searched for hawk and bird but nothing came up so I decided to do this little file, and eventually decided to release it to the public.

SOLUTION:
What I\'ve done is that I cranked up the size of the texture aswell as adding a sharpness filter to both the normal map and the texture itself. This provided a \"cleaner\" looking texture which didn\'t look half bad in-game.

INSTALL:
Put the Texture folder into the Data folder in the Skyrim Main Directory (C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\)
IF asked to overwrite click yes and it will continue.
That\'s about it. Enjoy!
author: Fiddi
